name: Maze of Madness
description:
Most of game developers have the same problem - they just cannot finish what they have started. They come up with many great ideas, but give up in a halfway of creation process.
I'm one of theese. So one day I decided to make a game, actually finish it, and all of that in under a week. And this is it - Maze of Madness.

This game will give you a huge headache because of it's mindtwisting passages. It even has two different endings!

Hope you enjoy it :)
